movie.title: Planet of the Humans
movie.description_intro: Planet of the Humans (2019), a documentary that dares to say what no one else will this Earth Day - that we are losing the battle to stop climate change on planet earth because we are following leaders who have taken us down the wrong road - selling out the green movement to wealthy interests and corporate America. This film is the wake-up call to the reality we are afraid to face: that in the midst of a human-caused extinction event, the environmental movement's answer is to push for techno-fixes and band-aids. It's too little, too late. Removed from the debate is the only thing that MIGHT save us: getting a grip on our out-of-control human presence and consumption. Why is this not THE issue? Because that would be bad for profits, bad for business. Have we environmentalists fallen for illusions, "green" illusions, that are anything but green, because we're scared that this is the end-and we've pinned all our hopes on biomass, wind turbines, and electric cars? No amount of batteries ...

movies.title: Free Solo
movies.summary: Alex Honnold attempts to become the first person to ever free solo climb El Capitan.
movies.description_full: Alex Honnold attempts to become the first person to ever free solo climb El Capitan.
movies.synopsis: Alex Honnold attempts to become the first person to ever free solo climb El Capitan.

movies.title: David Lynch: The Art Life
movies.summary: David Lynch takes us on an intimate journey through the formative years of his life. From his idyllic upbringing in small town America to the dark streets of Philadelphia, we follow Lynch as he traces the events that have helped to shape one of cinema's most enigmatic directors. David Lynch the Art Life infuses Lynch's own art, music and early films, shining a light into the dark corners of his unique world, giving audiences a better understanding of the man and the artist. As Lynch states "I think every time you do something, like a painting or whatever, you go with ideas and sometimes the past can conjure those ideas and color them, even if they're new ideas, the past colors them."

movies.title: Expedition Happiness
movies.summary: Two free spirits, one dog. Traveling the vast spaces of an enormous continent in search of something more.
movies.description_full: Two free spirits, one dog. Traveling the vast spaces of an enormous continent in search of something more.

movies.title: Red Army
movies.summary: Red Army is a feature documentary about the Soviet Union and the most successful dynasty in sports history: the Red Army hockey team. Told from the perspective of its captain Slava Fetisov, the story portrays his transformation from national hero to political enemy. From the USSR to Russia, the film examines how sport mirrors social and cultural movements and parallels the rise and fall of the Red Army team with the Soviet Union.
